title: Small Group Exercise - Finite State Machines 2

quizDescription.text:
Purpose of the Activity
The purpose of this exercise is to practice what you have learned about finite state machines and to learn to create a new finite state machine to deal with a new requirement.

attachment: 02 Small Group Exercise - Finite State Machines 2.zip
